| History                 = 
The '''Wizardry Alchemy Necromancy Department''', often identified as "W.A.N.D.", is [[Strategic Homeland Intervention, Enforcement and Logistics Division (Earth-616)|S.H.I.E.L.D.'s]] [[Glossary:M#Magic|magic]] defense division, dealing with supernatural threats, even within the [[Avengers (Earth-616)|Avengers]]. The organization is made up of various magic users.

Director [[Pandora Peters (Earth-616)|Pandora Peters]] hired the [[Thunderbolts (Strike Team) (Earth-616)|Thunderbolts strike team]] to kill the rogue [[Stephen Strange (Earth-616)|Doctor Strange]], providing them with a magical arsenal for the job, but also spelling them to believe that they had procured the objects from [[Anthony Druid (Earth-616)|Doctor Druid's]] stores until they had completed their task. The evil Doctor Strange turned out to be the [[True Faeries (Old Ones)|True Fairie]] king [[Oberoth'm'gozz (Earth-616)|Oberoth'm'gozz]], who had kidnapped Strange. After returning Strange to safety, W.A.N.D. re-possessed their artifacts and rewarded the Thunderbolts with a [[Shawarma]] meal.{{r|Thunderbolts Annual Vol 2 1}}
